long_description: The comfortable and customizable JanSport Klamath 65 Pack hauls your gear on multiday adventures or day trips, whether you're crossing the Sierras, traveling through Europe or bagging a peak. GridFit(TM) system combines 3-point shoulder width adjustment with a sliding torso length adjustment to let you easily dial the pack fit to your body. Harness features padded shoulder straps with load lifters and sternum strap, a dual-density foam hipbelt and a fully padded back panel with vertical ventilation channel. Polyethylene framesheet and aluminum stay control the load and shift pack weight to your hips. Large, top-loading main compartment features a drawstring closure and zippered side access; hydration sleeve with clip and port accommodates a reservoir (sold separately). Separate sleeping bag compartment with internal shelf. Keep gear organized and accessible with a top-lid compartment, zippered side and front pockets, dual stretch-mesh water-bottle pockets and a zippered hipbelt pocket. The JanSport Klamath 65 Pack features bottom lashing webbing with buckles, multiple side webbing compression points and a large webbing haul handle.
short_description: The comfortable and customizable JanSport Klamath 65 Pack hauls your gear on multiday adventures or day trips, whether you're crossing the Sierras, traveling through Europe or bagging a peak.
